The Head of the Vanguard of Aden Adolf:
It looks like you made a choice. If you are ready, go to the the enemy"s camp. The fact that you have to do, no big deal. It should be simple destroy all the enemies that will fall our eyes. The battle will be fierce. If I fall, you will need to hurry to leave this place. I can not let so you died with me. As for me - essential we do not have. I guess about, Who will take on my post ... Well, everybody ready?
